list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the lines in which light (and heat) may seem to stream from the sun or any luminous body, or pass through a small opening.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a ray of sunlight came through the window
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tia nắng chiếu qua cửa sổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of a set of straight lines passing through one point.
a thing that is arranged radially.
a broad flat marine or freshwater fish with a cartilaginous skeleton, winglike pectoral fins, and a long slender tail. Many rays have venomous spines or electric organs.
spread from or as if from a central point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: delicate lines rayed out at each corner of her eyes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những đường nét tinh tế trên mạng mắt
